title: Falador Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Falador Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas in and near Falador, such as Burthorpe, Rimmington and Taverley.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Falador achievements
For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.
Falador Diary
Released 5 March 2015 (Update)
Area(s) Falador, Rimmington, Taverley, Burthorpe, Mudskipper Point and Port Sarim
Members Yes
Item reward Shield
Lamp XP rewards 2,500
7,500
15,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Sir Rebral
Levels required
Total level: 1026
 65  ----  60
 65  80  ----
 50  81  ----
 37  50  ----
 70  40  49
 37  ----  75
 88  72  91
 16  ----
66 289

The Falador Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas in and near Falador, such as Burthorpe, Rimmington and Taverley.

Sir Rebral's location.

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements. Note that the player must have completed all quests, have all soundtracks unlocked or have achieved level 99 in any skill for the elite tasks.

Rewards can be claimed from Sir Rebral in White Knights' Castle. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes
  • 7 References

Overview[edit | edit source]

The rewards can be claimed from Sir Rebral. He is located in the courtyard of the White Knights' Castle in Falador.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
10
5
13
16
 
63+
Quest Requirements
Doric's Quest
The Knight's Sword
Additional Requirements
None
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Falador shield 1
    • 25% Prayer restore once per day
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Tight-gap shortcut to the Chaos Temple from Burthorpe

Skill Requirements[1][2]

  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ 3.0 3.1 59 for ironmen or access to the Ancient Cavern.
  4. ^ 47 for ironmen.

Rewards

  • Falador shield 2
    • 50% Prayer restore once per day
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • 10% more experience from the Falador farming patch (The shield does not need to be equipped to gain this extra experience)
  • Access to a shortcut in the Motherlode Mine (requires 54 Agility)
  • Higher chance of receiving a clue scroll (1/106) from a guard in Falador

Skill Requirements[1][2]

  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ 3.0 3.1 130 Attack and Strength combined, or 99 in either, for access to the Warrior's Guild.

Rewards

  • Falador shield 3
    • 100% Prayer restore once per day
    • Mole locator on the shield, which automatically locates the Giant Mole upon entering its lair
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Access to a bank chest at the Crafting Guild
  • The Giant Mole will drop noted mole skins and mole claws.
  • Shortcut to the Fountain of Heroes requiring 67 agility.

Skill Requirements[1][2]

Quest Requirements
Wanted!
Additional Requirements
Attain the rank of White Knight Master
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ Having 99 in any skill, unlocking all music tracks or completing every quest is required.

Rewards

  • Falador shield 4
    • 100% Prayer restore twice per day
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • The tree patch in Falador will never get diseased.
  • Increased chance at receiving higher level ores when cleaning pay-dirt.
  • Allowed access to the alternative Amethyst mining spot.

Easy[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 1,000 coins (2,000 if female)
  • Bucket
  • Tiara
  • Mind talisman
  • Hammer
  • Any pickaxe
  • Blurite bar

Recommended:

  • Explorer's ring 2+
  • Mind Altar teleport (tablet)
  • Any Ranged weapon
Skills Needed
  • 5 Agility
  • 16 Construction
  • 10 Mining
  • 13 Smithing
Quests required
  • The Knight's Sword
  • Doric's Quest
Task Requirements
1. Find out what your family crest is from Sir Renitee (you must complete the dialogue).
  • 16 Construction
2. Climb over the western Falador wall.
  • 5 Agility
3. Browse Sarah's Farming Shop. None
4. Get a haircut from the Falador hairdresser.
  • 1,000 coins (2,000 coins if female)
5. Fill a bucket from the pump north of Falador West Bank.
  • Bucket
6. Kill a duck in Falador Park.
  • None, although a Ranged weapon is recommended
7. Make a mind tiara.
  • Tiara and a mind talisman
8. Take the boat to Entrana.
  • Have no weapons or armour equipped or in your inventory.
9. Repair a broken strut in the Motherlode Mine.
  • Hammer and any pickaxe
10. Claim a security book from the Security Guard upstairs at Port Sarim jail. None
11. Smith some Blurite limbs on Doric's anvil.
  • Completion of The Knight's Sword and Doric's Quest
  • 10 Mining and 13 Smithing
  • Hammer and a Blurite bar

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Falador shield 1
    • 25% Prayer restore once per day
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Tight-gap shortcut to the Chaos Temple from Burthorpe

Medium[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Bullseye lantern
  • Tinderbox
  • Crystal key
  • Scarecrow
  • Fishing explosive
  • Mith grapple
  • Means to cast Telegrab and Falador teleport (4 air runes, 2 law runes and 1 water rune)
  • Any crossbow that you can wield
  • Initiate armour
  • Any pickaxe
  • Any axe
  • Brown apron or a Crafting cape
  • 6 willow branches
Skills Needed
  • 42 Agility
  • 20 Cooking[?]
  • 40 Crafting
  • 20 Defence
  • 23 Farming
  • 49 Firemaking
  • 37 Magic
  • 40 Mining
  • 10 Prayer
  • 19 Ranged
  • 32 Slayer
  • 37 Strength
  • 40 Thieving
  • 30 Woodcutting
  • 12 Quest points[?]

Ironmen:

  • 59 Fletching[?]
  • 59 Smithing[?]
Quests required
  • Partial completion of Ratcatchers
    • Start The Giant Dwarf for access to Keldagrim
    • Icthlarin's Little Helper
      • Gertrude's Cat
  • Recruitment Drive
    • Black Knights' Fortress
    • Druidic Ritual
  • Skippy and the Mogres
Task Requirements
1. Light a bullseye lantern at the Chemist's in Rimmington.
  • 49 Firemaking
  • Tinderbox and a regular bullseye lantern
2. Telegrab some Wine of zamorak at the Chaos Temple just outside the Wilderness
  • 33 Magic and means to cast Telegrab (1 1 )
3. Unlock the crystal chest in Taverley.
  • Crystal key
4. Place a Scarecrow in the Falador farm flower patch.
  • 23 Farming (level 47 for Ironman accounts)
  • Bronze spear, watermelon and hay sack (you can fill an empty sack with hay nearby)
5. Kill a Mogre at Mudskipper Point.
  • Completion of Skippy and the Mogres
  • 32 Slayer
  • Fishing explosive
6. Visit the Port Sarim Rat Pits.
  • Partial completion of Ratcatchers
7. Grapple up and then jump off the north Falador wall.
  • 11 Agility, 37 Strength and 19 Ranged
  • Mith grapple and any crossbow
8. Pickpocket a Falador guard.
  • 40 Thieving
9. Pray at the Altar of Guthix in Taverley whilst wearing full Initiate armour.
  • Completion of Recruitment Drive
  • 10 Prayer and 20 Defence
  • Initiate armour
10. Mine some gold ore at the Crafting Guild.
  • 40 Crafting and 40 Mining
  • Any pickaxe and a brown apron (or Crafting cape)
11. Squeeze through the crevice in the Dwarven Mines.
  • 42 Agility
12. Chop and burn some willow logs in Taverley (can cut and burn willows just south along water).
  • 30 Woodcutting and 30 Firemaking
  • Any axe and a tinderbox
13. Craft a basket on the Falador farm loom.
  • 36 Crafting (and 30 Farming for Ironman accounts)
  • 6 Willow branches
14. Teleport to Falador.
  • 37 Magic and means to cast Falador teleport (3 1 1 )

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Falador shield 2
    • 50% Prayer restore once per day
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • 10% more experience from the Falador farming patch (The shield does not need to be equipped to gain this extra experience)
  • Access to a shortcut in the Motherlode Mine (requires 54 Agility)
  • Higher chance of receiving a clue scroll (1/106) from a guard in Falador

Hard[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 10,000 coins
  • 28 rune, daeyalt or pure essence
  • Weaponry
  • Protection from dragonfire and icy breath
  • Full Prospector kit
  • Full Proselyte armour
  • Dwarven helmet
  • Spade
  • Light source
Skills Needed
  • 59 Agility[?]
  • 130 Attack Attack and Strength Strength combined
  • 53 Cooking[?]
  • 31 Crafting[?]
  • 50 Defence
  • 45 Farming[?]
  • 30 Firemaking[?]
  • 53 Fishing[?]
  • 52 Herblore[?]
  • 60 Mining
    • Note that full Prospector is required for this diary.
  • 70 Prayer(not boostable)
  • 56 Runecraft
  • 72 Slayer
  • 58 Thieving[?]
  • 71 Woodcutting[?]
  • 32 Quest points[?]
Quests required
  • Heroes' Quest
    • Shield of Arrav
    • Lost City
    • Merlin's Crystal
    • Dragon Slayer I
    • Druidic Ritual
  • The Slug Menace
    • Sea Slug
    • Wanted!
      • Priest in Peril
      • Recruitment Drive
        • Black Knights' Fortress
        • Druidic Ritual
      • The Lost Tribe
        • Rune Mysteries
        • Goblin Diplomacy
  • Grim Tales
    • Witch's House
Task Requirements
1. Craft 140 mind runes simultaneously from essence.
  • 56 Runecraft
  • 28 pure, daeyalt or rune essence, and a mind tiara or access to the Abyss
2. Change your family crest to the Saradomin symbol (talk to Sir Renitee).
  • 70 Prayer(not boostable)
  • 5,000 coins
3. Kill the Giant Mole beneath Falador Park.
  • Spade, light source and weaponry to kill it
4. Kill a Skeletal Wyvern in the Asgarnia Ice Dungeon.
  • 72 Slayer
  • Protection from the wyvern's icy breath and weaponry to slay it
5. Complete a lap of the Falador Rooftop Agility Course.
  • 50 Agility
6. Enter the Mining Guild wearing full Prospector.
  • 60 Mining
  • All pieces of the Prospector kit, bought for a total of 180 Golden nuggets in the Motherlode Mine
7. Kill the blue dragon under the Heroes' Guild.
  • Completion of the Heroes' Quest
  • Protection from dragonfire and weaponry to kill it
8. Crack a wall safe within Rogues' Den (can be those found in the lobby).
  • 50 Thieving
9. Recharge your Prayer in the Port Sarim church while wearing full Proselyte.
  • Completion of The Slug Menace
  • 30 Defence
  • Full Proselyte armour
10. Enter the Warriors' Guild.
  • 130 combined levels in Attack and Strength, or level 99 in either
11. Equip a Dwarven helmet within the Dwarven Mines.
  • Completion of Grim Tales
  • 50 Defence
  • Dwarven helmet

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Falador shield 3
    • 100% Prayer restore once per day
    • Mole locator on the shield, which automatically locates the Giant Mole upon entering its lair
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Access to a bank chest at the Crafting Guild
  • The Giant Mole will drop noted mole skins and mole claws.
  • Shortcut to the Fountain of Heroes requiring 67 agility.

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 28 rune, daeyalt or pure essence
  • 1,920 coins
  • Magic sapling
  • Spade
  • Any axe
  • Any Cape of Accomplishment (except event capes)
  • Toadflax potion (unf)
  • Crushed nest
Skills Needed
  • 80 Agility
  • 91 Farming
  • 81 Herblore
  • 17 Mining[?]
  • 88 Runecraft
  • 13 Thieving[?]
  • 75 Woodcutting
  • 32 Quest points[?]
  • Completion of all quests, having all soundtracks unlocked, or level 99 in any skill
Quests required
  • Wanted!
    • Priest in Peril
    • Recruitment Drive
      • Black Knights' Fortress
      • Druidic Ritual
    • The Lost Tribe
      • Rune Mysteries
      • Goblin Diplomacy
Task Requirements
1. Craft 252 air runes simultaneously from essence.
  • 88 Runecraft
  • 28 Pure, daeyalt or rune essence, and an air tiara or access to the Abyss
2. Purchase a white 2h sword from Sir Vyvin.
  • Completion of Wanted!
  • 1,920 coins
  • Rank of White Knight Master (Black Knight kill score of 1300, rank automatically starts at White Knight Novice, with a kill score of 100).
3. Find at least 3 magic roots at once when digging up your magic tree in Falador (you need to cut the tree down yourself).
  • 91 Farming and 75 Woodcutting
  • Magic sapling, spade and any axe
4. Perform a Skillcape or Quest cape emote at the top of Falador Castle.
  • Completion of all quests, having all soundtracks unlocked, or level 99 in any skill
  • Any Cape of Accomplishment (except event capes)
5. Jump over the strange floor in Taverley Dungeon.
  • 80 Agility
6. Mix a Saradomin brew in Falador East Bank.
  • 81 Herblore
  • Toadflax potion (unf), crushed nest

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Falador shield 4
    • 100% Prayer restore twice per day
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • The tree patch in Falador will never get diseased.
  • Increased chance at receiving higher level ores when cleaning pay-dirt.[1]
  • Allowed access to the alternative Amethyst mining spot.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence.

Date unknown

The Medium Falador Diary and Hard Falador Diary no longer provide any increased chance of receiving higher ores when cleaning pay dirt.[1]

2 June 2016
(update)

Removed strikethrough from the text stating where to reclaim your Falador shields in the Falador achievement diary menu.

23 July 2015
(update)

The 10% increase in XP at the Falador farming patch will now only apply after completing the Falador Medium Diary (rather than the easy diary), as intended.

18 June 2015
(update | poll)

The slight increased chance at receiving higher ores when cleaning pay-dirt if you have completed the Falador Hard Diary and a further increased chance if you have completed the Falador Elite Diary is now correctly applied.

23 April 2015
(update)

Players that have completed the Falador Medium Diary now have an increased chance of receiving clue scrolls from Falador guards.

5 March 2015
(update | poll)

You now receive 10% more experience from the Falador farming patch if you have completed the Falador Medium Diary.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 15 March 2020. (Archived from the original on 15 March 2020.) Mod Ash: "There's just one buff to pay-dirt, and it's for the elite diary only. This matches what the diary master says if asked."

Take the boat to [[Entrana]]. | *Have no [[weapons]] or [[armour]] equipped or in your inventory. |- |9. Repair a [[broken strut]] in the [[Motherlode Mine]]. | *[[Hammer]] and any [[pickaxe]] |- |10. Claim a [[security book]] from the [[Security Guard]] upstairs at [[Port Sarim]] jail. |{{NA|None}} |- |11. Smith some [[Blurite limbs]] on [[Doric]]'s anvil. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[The Knight's Sword]] and [[Doric's Quest]] *{{SCP|Mining|10|link=yes}} and {{SCP|Smithing|13|link=yes}} *[[Hammer]] and a [[Blurite bar]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Falador shield 1]] **25% [[Prayer]] restore once per day *[[Antique lamp]] worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30 *[[Tight-gap]] [[shortcut]] to the [[Chaos Temple (Asgarnia)|Chaos Temple]] from [[Burthorpe]] ==Medium== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Bullseye lantern]] *[[Tinderbox]] *[[Crystal key]] *[[Scarecrow]] *[[Fishing explosive]] *[[Mith grapple]] *Means to cast [[Telegrab]] and [[Falador teleport]] (4 [[air rune]]s, 2 [[law rune]]s and 1 [[water rune]]) *Any [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] that you can wield *[[Initiate armour]] *Any [[pickaxe]] *Any [[axe]] *[[Brown apron]] or a [[Crafting cape]] *6 [[willow branch]]es }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! Equip a [[Dwarven helmet]] within the [[Dwarven Mine]]s. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Grim Tales]] *{{SCP|Defence|50|link=yes}} *[[Dwarven helmet]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Falador shield 3]] **100% [[Prayer]] restore once per day **Mole locator on the shield, which automatically locates the [[Giant Mole]] upon entering its lair *[[Antique lamp]] worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50 *Access to a [[bank]] chest at the [[Crafting Guild]] *The [[Giant Mole]] will drop noted [[mole skin]]s and [[mole claw]]s. *[[Shortcut]] to the [[Fountain of Heroes]] requiring 67 agility. ==Elite== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *28 [[Rune essence|rune]], [[Daeyalt essence|daeyalt]] or [[pure essence]] *1,920 [[coins]] *[[Magic sapling]] *[[Spade]] *Any [[axe]] *Any [[Cape of Accomplishment]] (except event capes) *[[Toadflax potion (unf)]] *[[Crushed nest]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|80|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Farming|91|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Herblore|81|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Mining|17|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Runecraft|88|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|13|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|75|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Quest points|32|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *Completion of all quests, having all [[Music|soundtracks]] unlocked, or [[level 99]] in any skill }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[Wanted!]] **[[Priest in Peril]] **[[Recruitment Drive]] ***[[Black Knights' Fortress]] ***[[Druidic Ritual]] **[[The Lost Tribe]] ***[[Rune Mysteries]] ***[[Goblin Diplomacy]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Falador" data-diary-tier="Elite" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Perform a [[Cape of Accomplishment|Skillcape]] or [[Quest point cape|Quest cape]] emote at the top of [[White Knights' Castle|Falador Castle]]. | *Completion of all quests, having all [[Music|soundtracks]] unlocked, or [[level 99]] in any skill *Any [[Cape of Accomplishment]] (except event capes) |- |5. Jump over the [[Strange floor (Taverley Dungeon)|strange floor]] in [[Taverley Dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|80|link=yes}} |- |6. Mix a [[Saradomin brew]] in [[Falador East Bank]]. | *{{SCP|Herblore|81|link=yes}} *[[Toadflax potion (unf)]], [[crushed nest]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Falador shield 4]] **100% [[Prayer]] restore twice per day *[[Antique lamp]] worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70 *The [[tree patch]] in [[Falador]] will never get diseased. *Increased chance at receiving higher level [[ores]] when cleaning [[pay-dirt]].{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1239199151243644928|date=15 March 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.vn/cXsYP|archivedate=15 March 2020|quote=There's just one buff to pay-dirt, and it's for the elite diary only. This matches what the diary master says if asked.|name=Falador Diary reward tweet}} *Allowed access to the alternative [[Amethyst]] mining spot. ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 14 April 2021 |update = Below Ice Mountain |change = All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence. }} {{Subject changes |date = |change = The Medium Falador Diary and Hard Falador Diary no longer provide any increased chance of receiving higher ores when cleaning pay dirt.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1239199151243644928|date=15 March 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.vn/cXsYP|archivedate=15 March 2020|quote=There's just one buff to pay-dirt, and it's for the elite diary only. This matches what the diary master says if asked.|name=Falador Diary reward tweet}} }} {{Subject changes |date = 2 June 2016 |update = The Woodcutting Guild |change = Removed strikethrough from the text stating where to reclaim your Falador shields in the Falador achievement diary menu. }} {{Subject changes |date = 23 July 2015 |update = Big Cats & WWF |change = The 10% increase in XP at the Falador [[farming patch]] will now only apply after completing the [[Falador Medium Diary]] (rather than the [[Falador Easy Diary|easy diary]]), as intended. }} {{Subject changes |date = 18 June 2015 |update = Multiple Clues & Midsummer |poll = Old School Achievement Diary Rewards Poll |change = The slight increased chance at receiving higher ores when cleaning pay-dirt if you have completed the [[Falador Hard Diary]] and a further increased chance if you have completed the [[Falador Elite Diary]] is now correctly applied. }} {{Subject changes |date = 23 April 2015 |update = Crystal Halberd Special & More |change = Players that have completed the [[Falador Medium Diary]] now have an increased chance of receiving [[clue scrolls]] from [[Falador guards]]. }} {{Subject changes |date = 5 March 2015 |update = Achievement Diaries |poll = Old School Achievement Diary Rewards Poll |change = You now receive 10% more experience from the Falador [[farming patch]] if you have completed the [[Falador Medium Diary]]. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Achievement diary}}
